header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends

body.u: honestly don't even worry about it it's fine like cos originally when it happened I I mean we were talking about Valentine's Day and erm or like what are you gonna do for ? and they were just like erm well I don't know I'm thinking about sending her a card and some flowers but I don't know how I'm going to do it like in his broken English
but he tried erm so I were replying in French because he'd send like five six Snapchats saying what have you just said and I like
erm okay give me five minutes and I were just translating it into French

so my French were probably terrible but his English were just as terrible so we were sort of like talking in French and English to each other like trying to arrange it and erm I was like why aren't we even why aren't we using Facebook? we've both got Facebook
we could use the Facebook message

that's why when I came through with the roses I like hugged you because I just assumed like I didn't think that he would have done that and I hugged you thinking oh you've given it to me because you know that I'm like upset and that he's not here and when you were like pushed me away like that's not from me I was like
just in such a state of shock like oh god
but yeah er I was like when he was when he were when we were talking about it I was like oh he's so sweet gonna love it he was so surprised oh

cos er on Skype as well when I spoke and I said thank you properly and stuff he was like you have mm to thank more than me cos she's you know organised it all she did everything for me and I just literally sat there and broke down again I was like I'm surrounded by so many nice people in my life right now
literally loved it it's so amazing

but erm yeah like he he didn't specify flowers and I were just like I'm just gonna go and get roses because the one flower that when he bought you the flower in France it were a rose and I thought if he was here he would buy you roses so
I went and found the nicest bouquet that I could find
and I were just like she'll love them and they're from so it means more
I did love them they were beautiful
so but yeah as if I'd do anything as cheesy as buy you flowers on Valentine's Day?
if you didn't have a boyfriend I would have done that but
and I knew that wanted to buy you flowers so
but roses do have a lot of meaning to me like because they're roses as well it's romantic
yeah cos he always says do you remember when I told you that he was like you represent for me what a rose represents like all red and blah blah blah

it's cool I haven't had a lot of cheese in my life first part of cheese was that first rose
